title: Motorola Edge 30 real-life photos appear in new leak, and it looks like a Moto phone
content:
Motorola just released the Motorola Edge Plus in the United States, which is called the Motorola Edge 30 Pro in the rest of the world. Not only are the different names confusing, but the ‘Pro’ or ‘Plus’ would indicate there is a normal Edge phone… which is currently not the case. However, leaks have indicated

The post Motorola Edge 30 real-life photos appear in new leak, and it looks like a Moto phone appeared first on xda-developers.
description: One of Motorola's upcoming flagship-class phones, the Motorola Edge 30, has now been leaked beyond press renders.
